name: Developer Competency Package
description: Comprehensive developer competency package aggregating code review, analysis, testing, and quality improvement capabilities with specialized workflows for software development tasks

index_metadata.description_short: Developer: code review, analysis, refactoring, and quality improvement

author: OLAF Framework

classification.reason: Essential foundational competency for the developer persona

target_users.description: Software developers performing code reviews and refactoring, architects reviewing technical implementation, prompt engineers optimizing AI-assisted coding

technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Git, programming language tools, code analysis tools

entry_points.description: Comprehensive code review with multiple input modes - manual selection, git-modified files, or batch processing. Focuses on quality, security, and maintainability.
entry_points.name: Review Code
entry_points.use_case: Comprehensive code review with multiple input modes - manual selection, git-modified files, or batch processing. Focuses on quality, security, and maintainability.

entry_points.description: Review code for accessibility compliance and WCAG standards
entry_points.name: Review Code Accessibility
entry_points.use_case: Review code for accessibility compliance and WCAG standards

entry_points.description: Review pull request with user-guided selection, integration analysis, and action plan generation
entry_points.name: Review Github Pr
entry_points.use_case: Review pull request with user-guided selection, integration analysis, and action plan generation

entry_points.description: Analyze function complexity and provide optimization recommendations
entry_points.name: Analyze Function Complexity
entry_points.use_case: Analyze function complexity and provide optimization recommendations

entry_points.description: Reduce cyclomatic complexity with refactoring suggestions
entry_points.name: Improve Cyclomatic Complexity
entry_points.use_case: Reduce cyclomatic complexity with refactoring suggestions

entry_points.description: Identify and refactor code smells and anti-patterns
entry_points.name: Fix Code Smells
entry_points.use_case: Identify and refactor code smells and anti-patterns

entry_points.description: Enhance unit tests and improve test coverage
entry_points.name: Augment Code Unit Test
entry_points.use_case: Enhance unit tests and improve test coverage

entry_points.description: Incrementally improve and evolve code with iterative refinement
entry_points.name: Evolve Code Iteratively
entry_points.use_case: Incrementally improve and evolve code with iterative refinement

entry_points.description: Extract and generate technical specifications from code
entry_points.name: Generate Tech Spec From Code
entry_points.use_case: Extract and generate technical specifications from code

entry_points.description: Deep-dive technical analysis focused on developer concerns - code quality, unit testing, architecture patterns, design principles assessment with evidence-based evaluation
entry_points.name: Deepen Tech Spec Developer
entry_points.use_case: Deep-dive technical analysis focused on developer concerns - code quality, unit testing, architecture patterns, design principles assessment with evidence-based evaluation

entry_points.description: Search and analyze TODO comments in codebase, assess validity, and generate complete code solutions with user decision tracking
entry_points.name: Check Todos In Code
entry_points.use_case: Search and analyze TODO comments in codebase, assess validity, and generate complete code solutions with user decision tracking

entry_points.description: Critical evaluation of codebase against established engineering principles (SOLID, DRY, YAGNI) with evidence-based scoring and specific improvement recommendations
entry_points.name: Assess Code Quality Principles
entry_points.use_case: Critical evaluation of codebase against established engineering principles (SOLID, DRY, YAGNI) with evidence-based scoring and specific improvement recommendations

entry_points.description: Use this prompt to reproduce the workflow in any repository (any language/framework).

capabilities: Comprehensive code review with multiple input modes (manual, git-modified, batch)
Git repository change detection and analysis
Multi-file batch processing and aggregated reporting

examples.name: Git-Modified Files Review Workflow
examples.description: Automated discovery and review of git-modified files with batch processing and summary reporting

examples.name: Quality Improvement Cycle
examples.description: Identify and fix code smells with test coverage enhancement

examples.name: Code Quality & Review Cycle
examples.description: Comprehensive code quality improvement with accessibility and PR review

changes: Merged review-code and review-modified-files into unified competency
